abstract: Op-Ed article by Muslim cleric Fethullah Gulen refutes Turkish Pres Recep Tayyip Erdogan's accusations regarding failed military coup; Gulen denies orchestrating revolt and urges United States to resist Erdogan's call for extradition.
lead_paragraph: Turkey’s president has wrongly accused me of instigating a coup attempt. Now he is cracking down on all his enemies.

headline.main: Fethullah Gulen: I Condemn All Threats to Turkey’s Democracy
headline.print_headline: I Believe in Democracy for Turkey

snippet: Turkey’s president has wrongly accused me of instigating a coup attempt. Now he is cracking down on all his enemies....

keywords.value: Coups D'Etat and Attempted Coups D'Etat

keywords.value: Islamic State in Iraq and Syria (ISIS)
